files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
.DS_Store

# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
lerna-debug.log*
pnpm-debug.log*

# Diagnostic reports (https://nodejs.org/api/report.html)
report.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.[0-9]*.json

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
lib-cov

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage
*.lcov

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output

# Grunt intermediate storage (https://gruntjs.com/creating-plugins#storing-task-files)
.grunt

# Bower dependency directory (https://bower.io/)
bower_components

# node-waf configuration
.lock-wscript

# Compiled binary addons (https://nodejs.org/api/addons.html)
build/Release

# Dependency directories
node_modules/
jspm_packages/

# TypeScript v1 declaration files
typings/

# TypeScript cache
*.tsbuildinfo

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Microbundle cache
.rpt2_cache/
.rts2_cache_cjs/
.rts2_cache_es/
.rts2_cache_umd/

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variables file
.env
.env.test
.env.local
.env.*.local


# parcel-bundler cache (https://parceljs.org/)
.cache

# Next.js build output
.next

# Nuxt.js build / generate output
.nuxt
dist

# Gatsby files
.cache/
# Comment in the public line in if your project uses Gatsby and *not* Next.js
# https://nextjs.org/blog/next-9-1#public-directory-support
# public

# vuepress build output
.vuepress/dist

# Serverless directories
.serverless/

# FuseBox cache
.fusebox/

# DynamoDB Local files
.dynamodb/

# TernJS port file
.tern-port

# Editor directories and files
.idea
.vscode
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?

#Electron-builder output
/dist_electron

files.name: README.md
files.content:
Chat with ALL AI Bots Concurrently, Discover the Best

[Deutsch](README_DE-DE.md) | English | [Espa√±ol](README_ES-ES.md) | [Fran√ßais](README_FR-FR.md) | [Italian](README_IT-IT.md) | [Êó•Êú¨Ë™û](README_JA-JP.md) | [ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥](README_KO-KR.md) | [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](README_RU-RU.md) | [Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát](README_VI-VN.md) | [ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá](README_ZH-CN.md) [![Open in GitHub Codespaces](https://github.com/codespaces/badge.svg)](https://codespaces.new/ai-shifu/ChatALL)
## Screenshots ![Screenshot](screenshots/screenshot-1.png?raw=true) ## Features Large Language Models (LLMs) based AI bots are amazing. However, their behavior can be random and different bots excel at different tasks. If you want the best experience, don't try them one by one. ChatALL (Chinese name: ÈΩêÂè®) can send prompt to several AI bots concurrently, help you to discover the best results. All you need to do is [download, install](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases) and ask. ### Is this you? Typical users of ChatALL are: - ü§†**Gurus of LLMs**, who want to find the best answers or creations from LLMs. - ü§ì**Researchers of LLMs**, who want to intuitively compare the strengths and weaknesses of various LLMs in different fields. - üòé**Developers of LLM applications**, who want to quickly debug prompts and find the best-performing foundation models. ### Supported bots | AI Bots | Web Access | API | Notes | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------- | | [360 AI Brain](https://ai.360.cn/) | Yes | No API | | | [Baidu ERNIE](https://yiyan.baidu.com/) | No | Yes | | | [Character.AI](https://character.ai/) | Yes | No API | | | [ChatGLM2 6B & 130B](https://chatglm.cn/) | Yes | No API | No Login required | | [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com) | Yes | Yes | Web Browsing, Azure OpenAI service included | | [Claude](https://www.anthropic.com/claude) | Yes | Yes | | | [Code Llama](https://ai.meta.com/blog/code-llama-large-language-model-coding/) | Yes | No API | | | [Cohere Aya 23](https://cohere.com/blog/aya23) | No | Yes | | | [Cohere Command R Models](https://cohere.com/command) | No | Yes | | | [Copilot](https://copilot.microsoft.com/) | Yes | No API | | | [Dedao Learning Assistant](https://ai.dedao.cn/) | Coming soon | No API | | | [Falcon 180B](https://huggingface.co/tiiuae/falcon-180B-chat) | Yes | No API | | | [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com/) | Yes | Yes | | | [Gemma 2B & 7B](https://blog.google/technology/developers/gemma-open-models/) | Yes | No API | | | [Gradio](https://gradio.app/) | Yes | No API | For Hugging Face space/self-deployed models | | [Groq Cloud](https://console.groq.com/docs/models) | No | Yes | | | [HuggingChat](https://huggingface.co/chat/) | Yes | No API | | | [iFLYTEK SPARK](http://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/) | Yes | Coming soon | | | [Kimi](https://kimi.moonshot.cn/ ) | Yes | No API | | | [Llama 2 13B & 70B](https://ai.meta.com/llama/) | Yes | No API | | | [MOSS](https://moss.fastnlp.top/) | Yes | No API | | | [Perplexity](https://www.perplexity.ai/) | Yes | No API | | | [Phind](https://www.phind.com/) | Yes | No API | | | [Pi](https://pi.ai) | Yes | No API | | | [Poe](https://poe.com/) | Yes | Coming soon | | | [SkyWork](https://neice.tiangong.cn/) | Yes | Coming soon | | | [Tongyi Qianwen](http://tongyi.aliyun.com/) | Yes | Coming soon | | | [Vicuna 13B & 33B](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-03-30-vicuna/) | Yes | No API | No Login required | | [WizardLM 70B](https://github.com/nlpxucan/WizardLM) | Yes | No API | | | [xAI Grok](https://x.ai) | No | Yes | | | [YouChat](https://you.com/) | Yes | No API | | | [You](https://you.com/) | Yes | No API | | | [Zephyr](https://huggingface.co/spaces/HuggingFaceH4/zephyr-chat) | Yes | No API | | More is coming. Upvote your favorite bots in [these issues](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/labels/more%20LLMs). ### Note on Web-connected Bot Reliability Web-connected AI bots (those marked with "Web Access") are inherently less reliable and frequently face stability issues, as service providers regularly update their web interfaces and security measures. These web-based connections rely on reverse engineering and are difficult to maintain, often breaking unexpectedly. For a dependable experience, we strongly recommend using bots that offer API access whenever possible. ### Other features - Quick-prompt mode: send the next prompt without waiting for the previous request to complete - Save chat history locally, protect your privacy - Highlight the response you like, delete the bad - Enable/disable any bots at any time - Switch between one, two, or three-column view - Auto update to the latest version - Dark mode (contributed by @tanchekwei) - Short keys. Press Ctrl + / to know all of them (contributed by @tanchekwei) - Multiple chats (contributed by @tanchekwei) - Proxy setting (contributed by @msaong) - Prompt management (contributed by @tanchekwei) - Supports multiple languages (Chinese, English, German, French, Russian, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, Spanish, Italian) - Supports Windows, macOS and Linux Planned features: You are welcome to contribute to these features. - [ ] Deploy front-end to GitHub Pages ## Privacy All chat history, settings and login data are saved locally on your computer. ChatALL collects anonymous usage data to help us improve the product. Including: - Which AI bots are prompted and how long the prompt is. Not including the prompt content. - How long the response is, and which response is deleted/highlighted. Not including the response content. ## Prerequisites ChatALL is a client, not a proxy. Therefore, you must: 1. Have working accounts and/or API tokens for the bots. 2. Have reliable network connections to the bots. ## Download / Install Download from https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### On Windows Just download the \*-win.exe file and proceed with the setup. ### On macOS For Apple Silicon Mac (M1, M2 CPU), download the \*-mac-arm64.dmg file. For other Macs, download \*-mac-x64.dmg file. If you are using [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), you can also install it with: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### On Linux Debian-based Distributions: Download the .deb file, double click it and install the software. Arch-based Distributions: You can clone ChatALL from the AUR [here](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin). You can install it manually or using an AUR helper like yay or paru. Other Distributions: Download the .AppImage file, make it executable, and enjoy the click-to-run experience. You can also use [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher). ## Troubleshooting If you encounter any problems while using ChatALL, you can try the following methods to resolve them: 1. **Refresh** - press Ctrl + R or ‚åò + R. 2. **Restart** - exit ChatALL and run it again. 3. **Re-login** - click the settings button in the upper right corner, then click the corresponding login/logout link to relogin the website. 4. **Create a new chat** - click the `New Chat` button and send prompt again. If none of the above methods work, you can try **resetting ChatALL**. Note that this will delete all your settings and message history. You can reset ChatALL by deleting the following directories: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` If the problem persists, please [submit an issue](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## For developers ### Contribute a Bot [The guide](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA) may help you. ### Run ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### Build Build for your current platform: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Build for all platforms: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## Credits ### Contributors ### Others - GPT-4 contributed much of the code - ChatGPT, Copilot and Google provide many solutions (ranked in order) - Inspired by [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub). Respect! ## Sponsor If you like this project, please consider: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

Wenn Sie die beste Erfahrung machen wollen, sollten Sie sie nicht einzeln ausprobieren. ChatALL (chinesischer Name: ÈΩêÂè®) kann Anfragen an mehrere KI-Bots gleichzeitig senden und Ihnen so helfen, die besten Ergebnisse zu erzielen. Alles, was Sie tun m√ºssen, ist [herunterladen, installieren](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases) und fragen. ### Sind Sie das? Typische Benutzer von ChatALL sind: - ü§†**LLM-Gurus**, die die besten Antworten oder Kreationen von LLMs finden m√∂chten. - ü§ì**LLM-Forscher**, die die St√§rken und Schw√§chen verschiedener LLMs in unterschiedlichen Bereichen intuitiv vergleichen m√∂chten. - üòé**LLM-Anwendungsentwickler**, die Prompts schnell debuggen und die leistungsst√§rksten Basismodelle finden m√∂chten. ### Supported Stimmen Sie f√ºr Ihre Lieblings-Bots in [diesen Issues](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/labels/more%20LLMs) ab. ### Hinweis zur Zuverl√§ssigkeit webbasierter KI-Bots Webbasierte KI-Bots (die mit "Web Zugang" gekennzeichnet sind) sind von Natur aus weniger zuverl√§ssig und haben h√§ufig mit Stabilit√§tsproblemen zu k√§mpfen, da Dienstanbieter ihre Webschnittstellen und Sicherheitsma√ünahmen regelm√§√üig aktualisieren. Diese webbasierten Verbindungen beruhen auf Reverse Engineering und sind schwer zu warten, was oft zu unerwarteten Ausf√§llen f√ºhrt. F√ºr eine zuverl√§ssige Nutzung empfehlen wir dringend, wann immer m√∂glich, Bots mit API-Zugang zu verwenden. ### Weitere Funktionen - Schneller Prompt-Modus: Senden Sie den n√§chsten Prompt, ohne auf das Ende der vorherigen Anfrage zu warten - Lokale Speicherung des Chatverlaufs zum Schutz Ihrer Privatsph√§re - Markieren Sie die Antwort, die Ihnen gef√§llt, und l√∂schen Sie die schlechte Antwort - Aktivieren/Deaktivieren von Bots zu jeder Zeit - Umschalten zwischen ein-, zwei- oder dreispaltiger Ansicht - Automatische Aktualisierung auf die neueste Version - Dunkelmodus (beigetragen von @tanchekwei) - Tastenkombinationen. Dr√ºcken Sie Strg + /, um alle zu sehen (beigetragen von @tanchekwei) - Mehrere Chats (beigetragen von @tanchekwei) - Proxy-Einstellungen (beigetragen von @msaong) - Prompt-Management (beigetragen von @tanchekwei) - Unterst√ºtzt mehrere Sprachen (Chinesisch, Englisch, Deutsch, Franz√∂sisch, Russisch, Vietnamesisch, Koreanisch, Japanisch, Spanisch, Italienisch) - Unterst√ºtzt Windows, macOS und Linux ### Geplante Funktionen Sie sind herzlich eingeladen, zu diesen Funktionen beizutragen. - [ ] Frontend auf GitHub Pages bereitstellen ## Datenschutz Alle Chat-Verl√§ufe, Einstellungen und Anmeldedaten werden lokal auf Ihrem Computer gespeichert. ChatALL sammelt anonyme Nutzungsdaten, um uns bei der Verbesserung des Produkts zu helfen. Dazu geh√∂ren: - Welche KI-Bots aufgefordert werden und wie lang die Eingabeaufforderung ist. Der Inhalt der Eingabeaufforderung wird nicht erfasst. - Wie lang die Antwort ist und welche Antwort gel√∂scht/markiert wird. Der Inhalt der Antwort wird nicht erfasst. ## Anforderungen ChatALL ist ein Client, kein Proxy. Daher m√ºssen Sie: 1. funktionierende Konten und/oder API-Tokens f√ºr die Bots haben. 2. zuverl√§ssige Netzwerkverbindungen zu den Bots haben. ## Download / Installation Downloaden von https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### Auf Windows Laden Sie einfach die Datei \*-win.exe herunter und fahren Sie mit der Installation fort. ### Auf macOS F√ºr Apple Silicon Mac (M1, M2 CPU), laden Sie die Datei \*-mac-arm64.dmg herunter. F√ºr andere Macs, laden Sie die Datei \*-mac-x64.dmg herunter. Wenn Sie [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/) verwenden, k√∂nnen Sie es auch damit installieren: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### Auf Linux Debian-basierte Distributionen: Laden Sie die .deb-Datei herunter, doppelklicken Sie darauf und installieren Sie die Software. Arch-basierte Distributionen: Sie k√∂nnen ChatALL aus dem AUR [hier](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin) klonen. Sie k√∂nnen es manuell oder mit einem AUR-Helfer wie yay oder paru installieren. Andere Distributionen: Laden Sie die .AppImage-Datei herunter, machen Sie sie ausf√ºhrbar und genie√üen Sie das Click-to-Run-Erlebnis. Sie k√∂nnen auch [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher) verwenden. ## Fehlerbehebung Wenn Sie beim Verwenden von ChatALL auf Probleme sto√üen, k√∂nnen Sie die folgenden Methoden ausprobieren, um sie zu beheben: 1. **Aktualisieren** - Dr√ºcken Sie Strg + R oder ‚åò + R. 2. **Neustarten** - Beenden Sie ChatALL und starten Sie es erneut. 3. **Erneut anmelden** - Klicken Sie auf die Schaltfl√§che "Einstellungen" in der oberen rechten Ecke und dann auf den entsprechenden Anmelde-/Abmelde-Link, um sich erneut anzumelden. 4. **Neuen Chat erstellen** - Klicken Sie auf die Schaltfl√§che `Neuer Chat` und senden Sie den Prompt erneut. Wenn keine der oben genannten Methoden funktioniert, k√∂nnen Sie versuchen, **ChatALL zur√ºckzusetzen**. Beachten Sie, dass dadurch alle Ihre Einstellungen und Nachrichtenverl√§ufe gel√∂scht werden. Sie k√∂nnen ChatALL zur√ºcksetzen, indem Sie die folgenden Verzeichnisse l√∂schen: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` Wenn das Problem weiterhin besteht, [reichen Sie ein Issue ein](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## F√ºr Entwickler ### Einen Bot beisteuern [Die Anleitung](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA) hilft dir dabei. ### Ausf√ºhren ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### Builden Build for your current platform: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Build for all platforms: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## Credits ### Mitwirkende ### Andere - GPT-4 hat einen Gro√üteil des Codes beigesteuert - ChatGPT, Copilot und Google bieten viele L√∂sungen (in dieser Reihenfolge) - Inspiriert von [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub). Respekt! ## Sponsor Wenn Ihnen dieses Projekt gef√§llt, erw√§gen Sie bitte: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

files.content:
Chatea con TODOS los bots de IA al mismo tiempo, descubre lo mejor

[Deutsch](README_DE-DE.md) | [English](README.md) | Espa√±ol | [Fran√ßais](README_FR-FR.md) | [Italiano](README_IT-IT.md) | [Êó•Êú¨Ë™û](README_JA-JP.md) | [ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥](README_KO-KR.md) | [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](README_RU-RU.md) | [Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát](README_VI-VN.md) | [ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá](README_ZH-CN.md) [![Open in GitHub Codespaces](https://github.com/codespaces/badge.svg)](https://codespaces.new/ai-shifu/ChatALL)
## Capturas de pantalla ![Captura de pantalla](screenshots/screenshot-1.png?raw=true) ## Funciones Los bots de IA basados en modelos de lenguaje grande (LLM) son incre√≠bles. Sin embargo, su comportamiento puede ser aleatorio y diferentes bots sobresalen en diferentes tareas. Si quieres la mejor experiencia, no los pruebes uno por uno. ChatALL (nombre chino: ÈΩêÂè®) puede enviar mensajes a varios bots de IA al mismo tiempo, ayudarlo a descubrir los mejores resultados. Todo lo que necesita hacer es [descargar, instalar](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases) y preguntar. ### ¬øEres t√∫? Los usuarios t√≠picos de ChatALL son: - ü§†**Gur√∫s de LLMs**, que quieren encontrar las mejores respuestas o creaciones de LLMs. - ü§ì**Investigadores de LLM**, que desean comparar intuitivamente las fortalezas y debilidades de varios LLM en diferentes campos. - üòé**Desarrolladores de aplicaciones LLM**, que desean depurar r√°pidamente los mensajes y encontrar los modelos de base de mejor rendimiento. ### Bots compatibles | IA Bots | Acceso Web | API | Notas | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | | [360 AI Brain](https://ai.360.cn/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Baidu ERNIE](https://yiyan.baidu.com/) | No | S√≠ | | | [Character.AI](https://character.ai/) | S√≠ | No | | | [ChatGLM2 6B & 130B](https://chatglm.cn/) | S√≠ | No | No requiere inicio de sesi√≥n | | [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com) | S√≠ | S√≠ | Navegaci√≥n Web, incluye servicio Azure OpenAI | | [Claude](https://www.anthropic.com/claude) | S√≠ | S√≠ | | | [Code Llama](https://ai.meta.com/blog/code-llama-large-language-model-coding/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Cohere Aya 23](https://cohere.com/blog/aya23) | No | S√≠ | | | [Modelos Cohere Command R](https://cohere.com/command) | No | S√≠ | | | [Copilot](https://copilot.microsoft.com/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Dedao Learning Assistant](https://ai.dedao.cn/) | Pr√≥ximamente | No | | | [Falcon 180B](https://huggingface.co/tiiuae/falcon-180B-chat) | S√≠ | No | | | [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com/) | S√≠ | S√≠ | | | [Gemma 2B & 7B](https://blog.google/technology/developers/gemma-open-models/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Gradio](https://gradio.app/) | S√≠ | No | Para modelos Hugging Face/spacio auto-deploy | | [Groq Cloud](https://console.groq.com/docs/models) | No | S√≠ | | | [HuggingChat](https://huggingface.co/chat/) | S√≠ | No | | | [iFLYTEK SPARK](http://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/) | S√≠ | Pr√≥ximamente | | | [Kimi](https://kimi.moonshot.cn/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Llama 2 13B & 70B](https://ai.meta.com/llama/) | S√≠ | No | | | [MOSS](https://moss.fastnlp.top/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Perplexity](https://www.perplexity.ai/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Phind](https://www.phind.com/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Pi](https://pi.ai) | S√≠ | No | | | [Poe](https://poe.com/) | S√≠ | Pr√≥ximamente | | | [SkyWork](https://neice.tiangong.cn/) | S√≠ | Pr√≥ximamente | | | [Tongyi Qianwen](http://tongyi.aliyun.com/) | S√≠ | Pr√≥ximamente | | | [Vicuna 13B & 33B](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-03-30-vicuna/) | S√≠ | No | No requiere inicio de sesi√≥n | | [WizardLM 70B](https://github.com/nlpxucan/WizardLM) | S√≠ | No | | | [xAI Grok](https://x.ai) | No | S√≠ | | | [YouChat](https://you.com/) | S√≠ | No | | | [You](https://you.com/) | S√≠ | No | | | [Zephyr](https://huggingface.co/spaces/HuggingFaceH4/zephyr-chat) | S√≠ | No | | M√°s est√° por venir. Vota a tus bots favoritos en [estos temas](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/labels/more%20LLMs). ### Nota sobre la fiabilidad de los bots de IA basados en Web Los bots de IA basados en Web (marcados como "Acceso Web") son inherentemente menos fiables y frecuentemente enfrentan problemas de estabilidad. Esto se debe a que los proveedores de servicios actualizan regularmente sus interfaces web y medidas de seguridad, lo que requiere un mantenimiento constante mediante ingenier√≠a inversa. Este tipo de conexi√≥n es dif√≠cil de mantener y puede dejar de funcionar inesperadamente. Para una experiencia m√°s confiable, recomendamos encarecidamente utilizar bots que ofrezcan acceso API cuando sea posible. ### Otras caracter√≠sticas - Modo de solicitud r√°pida: env√≠e la siguiente solicitud sin esperar a que se complete la solicitud anterior - Guarde el historial de chat localmente, proteja su privacidad - Resalta la respuesta que te gusta, elimina la mala - Habilite/deshabilite cualquier bot en cualquier momento - Cambiar entre una vista de una, dos o tres columnas - Actualizaci√≥n autom√°tica a la √∫ltima versi√≥n - Modo oscuro (contribuci√≥n de @tanchekwei) - Teclas cortas. Pulsa Ctrl + / para conocerlos todos (contribuci√≥n de @tanchekwei) - M√∫ltiples chats (contribuci√≥n de @tanchekwei) - Configuraci√≥n de proxy (contribuci√≥n de @msaong) - Gesti√≥n de mensajes (contribuci√≥n de @tanchekwei) - Soporta m√∫ltiples idiomas (chino, ingl√©s, alem√°n, franc√©s, ruso, vietnamita, coreano, japon√©s, espa√±ol, italiano) - Compatible con Windows, macOS y Linux Caracter√≠sticas planificadas: Le invitamos a contribuir a estas caracter√≠sticas. - [ ] Implementar front-end en p√°ginas de GitHub ## Privacidad Todo el historial de chat, la configuraci√≥n y los datos de inicio de sesi√≥n se guardan localmente en su computadora. ChatALL recopila datos de uso an√≥nimos para ayudarnos a mejorar el producto. Incluyendo: - Qu√© bots de IA se solicitan y cu√°nto tiempo dura la solicitud. No se incluye el contenido de la solicitud. - Cu√°nto tiempo dura la respuesta y qu√© respuesta se elimina/resalta. No se incluye el contenido de la respuesta. ## Prerrequisitos ChatALL es un cliente, no un proxy. Por lo tanto, usted debe: 1. Tener cuentas de trabajo y/o tokens API para los bots. 2. Tener conexiones de red confiables a los bots. ## Descargar / Instalar Descargar desde https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### En Windows Simplemente descargue el archivo \*-win.exe y contin√∫e con la configuraci√≥n. ### En macOS Para Apple Silicon Mac (CPU M1, M2), descargue el archivo \*-mac-arm64.dmg. Para otros Mac, descargue el archivo \*-mac-x64.dmg. Si est√° utilizando [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), tambi√©n puede instalarlo con: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### En Linux Distribuciones basadas en Debian: descargue el archivo .deb, haga doble clic en √©l e instale el software. Distribuciones basadas en Arch: puede clonar ChatALL desde el AUR [aqu√≠](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin). Puede instalarlo manualmente o utilizando un ayudante de AUR como yay o paru. Otras distribuciones: descargue el archivo .AppImage, h√°galo ejecutable y disfrute de la experiencia de hacer clic y ejecutar. Tambi√©n puede usar [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher). ## Soluci√≥n de problemas Si encuentra alg√∫n problema al usar ChatALL, puede probar los siguientes m√©todos para resolverlo: 1. **Actualizar** : pulse Ctrl + R o ‚åò + R. 2. **Reiniciar** : salga de ChatALL y ejec√∫telo de nuevo. 3. **Volver a iniciar sesi√≥n** - haga clic en el bot√≥n de configuraci√≥n en la esquina superior derecha, luego haga clic en el enlace de inicio/cierre de sesi√≥n correspondiente para volver a iniciar sesi√≥n en el sitio web. 4. **Crear un nuevo chat** - haga clic en el bot√≥n `Nuevo Chat` y env√≠e la solicitud nuevamente. Si ninguno de los m√©todos anteriores funciona, puede intentar **restablecer ChatALL.** Tenga en cuenta que esto eliminar√° toda su configuraci√≥n e historial de mensajes. Puede restablecer ChatALL eliminando los siguientes directorios: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` Si el problema persiste, [env√≠e un problema](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## Para desarrolladores ### Contribuir con un bot [La gu√≠a](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA) puede ayudarle. ### Correr ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### Construir Cree para su plataforma actual: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Compilar para todas las plataformas: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## Cr√©ditos ### Colaboradores ### Otros - GPT-4 contribuy√≥ con gran parte del c√≥digo - ChatGPT, Copilot y Google proporcionan muchas soluciones (clasificadas en orden) - Inspirado en [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub). ¬°Respeto! ## Patrocinador Si te gusta este proyecto, por favor considera: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

Pour une exp√©rience fiable, nous recommandons vivement d'utiliser des robots offrant un acc√®s API lorsque c'est possible. ### Autres fonctionalit√©s - Mode d'invite rapide : envoyez l'invite suivante sans attendre la fin de la demande pr√©c√©dente. - Stockage local de l'historique du chat, pour prot√©ger votre vie priv√©e - Mettez en √©vidence les r√©ponses que vous aimez, supprimez les mauvaises - Activer/d√©sactiver les bots √† tout moment - Choix de l'affichage en une, deux ou trois colonnes - Mise √† jour automatique vers la derni√®re version - Mode sombre (contribu√© par @tanchekwei) - Raccourcis clavier. Appuyez sur Ctrl + / pour les conna√Ætre tous (contribu√© par @tanchekwei) - Plusieurs chats (contribu√© par @tanchekwei) - Param√®tres de proxy (contribu√© par @msaong) - Gestion des invites (contribu√© par @tanchekwei) - Supporte plusieurs langues (chinois, anglais, allemand, fran√ßais, russe, vietnamien, cor√©en, japonais, espagnol, italien) - Supporte Windows, macOS et Linux Fonctionnalit√©s pr√©vues : Vous √™tes invit√©s √† contribuer √† ces fonctionnalit√©s. - [ ] D√©ployer le front-end sur GitHub Pages ## Confidentialit√© Tout l'historique des discussions, les param√®tres et les donn√©es de connexion sont enregistr√©s localement sur votre ordinateur. ChatALL collecte des donn√©es d'utilisation anonymes pour nous aider √† am√©liorer le produit. Cela inclut : - Quels bots IA sont sollicit√©s et la longueur de l'invite. Le contenu de l'invite n'est pas inclus. - La longueur de la r√©ponse, et quelles r√©ponses sont supprim√©es/mises en √©vidence. Le contenu de la r√©ponse n'est pas inclus. ## Pr√©requis ChatALL est un client, pas un proxy. Par cons√©quent, vous devez : 1. Avoir des comptes et/ou des jetons API fonctionnels pour les bots. 2. Avoir des connexions r√©seau fiables avec les bots. ## T√©l√©charger / Installer T√©l√©charger depuis https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### Sur Windows Just download the \*-win.exe file and proceed with the setup. ### Sur macOS Pour les Macs de type Apple Silicon (M1, M2 CPU), t√©l√©chargez le fichier \*-mac-arm64.dmg. Pour les autres Macs (Intel), t√©l√©chargez le fichier \*-mac-x64.dmg. Si vous utilisez [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), vous pouvez √©galement l'installer avec : ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### Sur Linux Distributions bas√©es sur Debian : T√©l√©chargez le fichier .deb, double-cliquez dessus et installez le logiciel. Distributions bas√©es sur Arch : Vous pouvez cloner ChatALL depuis l'AUR [ici](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin). Vous pouvez l'installer manuellement ou en utilisant un assistant AUR comme yay ou paru. Autres distributions : T√©l√©chargez le fichier .AppImage, rendez-le ex√©cutable et profitez de l'exp√©rience "click-to-run". Vous pouvez √©galement utiliser [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher). ## D√©pannage Si vous rencontrez des probl√®mes lors de l'utilisation de ChatALL, vous pouvez essayer les m√©thodes suivantes pour les r√©soudre : 1. **Rafra√Æchir** - appuyez sur Ctrl + R ou ‚åò + R. 2. **Red√©marrer** - quittez ChatALL et relancez-le. 3. **Reconnectez-vous** - cliquez sur le bouton des param√®tres en haut √† droite, puis cliquez sur le lien de connexion/d√©connexion correspondant pour vous reconnecter au site. 4. **Cr√©er une nouvelle discussion** - cliquez sur le bouton `New Chat` et envoyez l'invite √† nouveau. Si aucune des m√©thodes ci-dessus ne fonctionne, vous pouvez essayer de **r√©initialiser ChatALL**. Notez que cela supprimera tous vos param√®tres et l'historique des messages. Vous pouvez r√©initialiser ChatALL en supprimant les r√©pertoires suivants : - Windows : `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux : `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS : `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` Si le probl√®me persiste, veuillez [soumettre un probl√®me](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## Pour les d√©veloppeurs ### Contribuer √† un bot [Le guide](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA) may help you. ### Lancement ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### Build Build pour votre plateforme actuelle: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Build pour toutes les plateformes: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## Credits ### Contributeurs ### Autres - GPT-4 a contribu√© √† une grande partie du code - ChatGPT, Copilot et Google fournissent de nombreuses solutions (class√©es par ordre). - Inspir√© par [ChatHub] (https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub). Respect ! ## Sponsor Si vous aimez ce projet, veuillez envisager: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

files.content:
Chatta contemporaneamente con TUTTI gli IA Bots, scopri il migliore

[Deutsch](README_DE-DE.md) | [English](README.md) | [Espa√±ol](README_ES-ES.md) | [Fran√ßais](README_FR-FR.md) | Italian | [Êó•Êú¨Ë™û](README_JA-JP.md) | [ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥](README_KO-KR.md) | [–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π](README_RU-RU.md) | [Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát](README_VI-VN.md) | [ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá](README_ZH-CN.md) [![Open in GitHub Codespaces](https://github.com/codespaces/badge.svg)](https://codespaces.new/ai-shifu/ChatALL)
## Screenshots ![Screenshot](screenshots/screenshot-1.png?raw=true) ## Caratteristiche I Bot IA basati su Large Language Models (LLMs) sono sorprendenti. Tuttavia, il loro comportamento pu√≤ essere casuale e diversi bot eccellono in diverse attivit√†. Se desideri la migliore esperienza, non provarli uno per uno. ChatALL (nome cinese: ÈΩêÂè®) pu√≤ inviare prompt a diversi IA Bot contemporaneamente, aiutandoti a scoprire i migliori risultati. Tutto ci√≤ che devi fare √® [scaricare, installare](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases) e chiedere . ### Sei uno di questi? Gli utenti tipici di ChatALL sono: - ü§†**Guru dei LLM**, che vogliono trovare le migliori risposte o creazioni dai LLM. - ü§ì**Ricercatori dei LLM**, che vogliono confrontare intuitivamente i punti di forza e di debolezza di vari LLM in diversi campi. - üòé**Sviluppatori di applicazioni dei LLM**, che vogliono debuggare rapidamente i prompt e trovare i modelli di base pi√π performanti. ### Bot supportati | IA Bots | Accesso Web | API | Note | | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | | [360 AI Brain](https://ai.360.cn/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Baidu ERNIE](https://yiyan.baidu.com/) | No | S√¨ | | | [Character.AI](https://character.ai/) | S√¨ | No | | | [ChatGLM2 6B & 130B](https://chatglm.cn/) | S√¨ | No | Nessun accesso richiesto | | [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com) | S√¨ | S√¨ | Navigazione Web, include servizi Azure OpenAI | | [Claude](https://www.anthropic.com/claude) | S√¨ | S√¨ | | | [Code Llama](https://ai.meta.com/blog/code-llama-large-language-model-coding/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Cohere Aya 23](https://cohere.com/blog/aya23) | No | S√¨ | | | [Modelli Cohere Command R](https://cohere.com/command) | No | S√¨ | | | [Copilot](https://copilot.microsoft.com/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Dedao Learning Assistant](https://ai.dedao.cn/) | Prossimamente | No | | | [Falcon 180B](https://huggingface.co/tiiuae/falcon-180B-chat) | S√¨ | No | | | [Gemini](https://gemini.google.com/) | S√¨ | S√¨ | | | [Gemma 2B & 7B](https://blog.google/technology/developers/gemma-open-models/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Gradio](https://gradio.app/) | S√¨ | No | Per modelli Hugging Face/spazio auto-deploy | | [Groq Cloud](https://console.groq.com/docs/models) | No | S√¨ | | | [HuggingChat](https://huggingface.co/chat/) | S√¨ | No | | | [iFLYTEK SPARK](http://xinghuo.xfyun.cn/) | S√¨ | Prossimamente | | | [Kimi](https://kimi.moonshot.cn/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Llama 2 13B & 70B](https://ai.meta.com/llama/) | S√¨ | No | | | [MOSS](https://moss.fastnlp.top/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Perplexity](https://www.perplexity.ai/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Phind](https://www.phind.com/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Pi](https://pi.ai) | S√¨ | No | | | [Poe](https://poe.com/) | S√¨ | Prossimamente | | | [SkyWork](https://neice.tiangong.cn/) | S√¨ | Prossimamente | | | [Tongyi Qianwen](http://tongyi.aliyun.com/) | S√¨ | Prossimamente | | | [Vicuna 13B & 33B](https://lmsys.org/blog/2023-03-30-vicuna/) | S√¨ | No | Nessun accesso richiesto | | [WizardLM 70B](https://github.com/nlpxucan/WizardLM) | S√¨ | No | | | [xAI Grok](https://x.ai) | No | S√¨ | | | [YouChat](https://you.com/) | S√¨ | No | | | [You](https://you.com/) | S√¨ | No | | | [Zephyr](https://huggingface.co/spaces/HuggingFaceH4/zephyr-chat) | S√¨ | No | | Altri sono in arrivo. Vota i tuoi bot preferiti in [questi problemi](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/labels/more%20LLMs). ### Nota sull'affidabilit√† dei bot AI basati sul Web I bot AI basati sul Web (contrassegnati con "Web Access") sono intrinsecamente meno affidabili e spesso incontrano problemi di stabilit√†, poich√© i fornitori di servizi aggiornano regolarmente le loro interfacce web e misure di sicurezza. Queste connessioni basate sul web si basano sul reverse engineering e sono difficili da mantenere, spesso smettendo di funzionare inaspettatamente. Per un'esperienza pi√π affidabile, raccomandiamo vivamente di utilizzare bot che offrono accesso API quando possibile. ### Altre funzionalit√† - Modalit√† prompt rapido: invia il prompt successivo senza attendere il completamento della richiesta precedente. - Salva la cronologia delle chat localmente, proteggendo la tua privacy. - Evidenzia la risposta che ti piace, elimina quelle indesiderate. - Abilita/disabilita i bot in qualsiasi momento. - Passa tra la vista a una, due o tre colonne. - Aggiornamento automatico all'ultima versione. - Modalit√† scura (contribuita da @tanchekwei). - Scorciatoie da tastiera. Premi Ctrl + / per conoscerle tutte (contribuite da @tanchekwei). - Chat multiple (contribuite da @tanchekwei). - Impostazione proxy (contribuito da @msaong). - Gestione dei prompt (contribuito da @tanchekwei). - Supporto per diverse lingue (cinese, inglese, tedesco, francese, russo, vietnamita, coreano, giapponese, spagnolo, italiano). - Supporto per Windows, macOS e Linux. Funzionalit√† pianificate: Siete benvenuti a contribuire a queste funzionalit√†. - [ ] Deploy del front-end su Pagine GitHub ## Privacy Tutta la cronologia delle chat, le impostazioni e i dati di accesso vengono salvati localmente sul tuo computer. ChatALL raccoglie dati anonimi sull'utilizzo per aiutarci a migliorare il prodotto. Inclusi: - Quali bot AI vengono sollecitati e quanto √® lungo il prompt. Non include il contenuto del prompt. - Quanto √® lunga la risposta e quale risposta viene eliminata/evidenziata. Non include il contenuto della risposta. ## Prerequisiti ChatALL √® un client, non un proxy. Pertanto, devi: 1. Avere account funzionanti e/o token API per i bot. 2. Avere connessioni di rete affidabili ai bot. ## Download / Installazione Scarica da https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### Su Windows Basta scaricare il file \*-win.exe e procedere con l'installazione. ### Su macOS Per Mac con processori Apple Silicon (M1, M2), scarica il file \*-mac-arm64.dmg. Per gli altri Mac, scarica il file \*-mac-x64.dmg. Se stai usando [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), puoi installarlo anche con: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### Su Linux Distribuzioni basate su Debian: Scarica il file .deb, fai doppio clic su di esso e installa il software. Distribuzioni basate su Arch: Puoi clonare ChatALL da AUR [qui](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin). Puoi installarlo manualmente o utilizzando un helper AUR come yay o paru. Altre distribuzioni: Scarica il file .AppImage, rendilo eseguibile e goditi l'esperienza del clic. Puoi anche utilizzare [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher). ## Risoluzione dei problemi Se incontri problemi durante l'utilizzo di ChatALL, puoi provare i seguenti metodi per risolverli: 1. **Ricarica** - premi Ctrl + R o ‚åò + R. 2. **Riavvia** - esci da ChatALL e avvialo nuovamente. 3. **Rilogin** - clicca sul pulsante delle impostazioni nell'angolo in alto a destra, quindi clicca sul link di accesso/uscita corrispondente per accedere nuovamente al sito web. 4. **Crea una nuova chat** - clicca sul pulsante `Nuova Chat` e invia nuovamente il prompt. Se nessuno dei metodi sopra elencati funziona, puoi provare a **reimpostare ChatALL**. Nota che ci√≤ canceller√† tutte le tue impostazioni e la cronologia dei messaggi. Puoi reimpostare ChatALL eliminando le seguenti directory: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` Se il problema persiste, per favore [segnala il problema](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## Per gli sviluppatori ### Contribuisci con un Bot [Guida](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA) potrebbe esserti utile. ### Esegui ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### Compila Compila per la tua piattaforma corrente: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Compila per tutte le piattaforme: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## Crediti ### Collaboratori ### Altri - GPT-4 ha contribuito gran parte del codice. - ChatGPT, Copilot e Google hanno fornito molte soluzioni (elencati in ordine). - Progetto ispirato da [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub). Rispetto! ## Sponsor Se ti piace questo progetto, per favore considera: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

AIÁî®„ÅÆ„Ç¢„Ç´„Ç¶„É≥„Éà„ÇÑ API „Éà„Éº„ÇØ„É≥„ÇíÊåÅ„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÄÇ 2. „Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Å∏„ÅÆ‰ø°È†ºÊÄß„ÅÆÈ´ò„ÅÑ„Éç„ÉÉ„Éà„ÉØ„Éº„ÇØÊé•Á∂ö„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„Åì„Å®„ÄÇ ## „ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ / „Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´ https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases „Åã„Çâ„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ ### Windows„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà \*-win-x64.exe „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„ÄÅ„Çª„ÉÉ„Éà„Ç¢„ÉÉ„Éó„ÇíÈÄ≤„ÇÅ„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ ### macOS„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà Apple„Ç∑„É™„Ç≥„É≥Mac (È†≠ÊñáÂ≠ó„Å´M„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãCPU)„ÅØ„ÄÅ\*-mac-arm64.dmg „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ Intel Mac„ÅØ„ÄÅ\*-mac-x64.dmg „Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/index_ja)„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅÊ¨°„ÅÆÊñπÊ≥ï„Åß„ÇÇ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åß„Åç„Åæ„ÅôÔºö ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### Linux„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà DebianÁ≥ª„Éá„Ç£„Çπ„Éà„É™„Éì„É•„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥: .deb„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„ÄÅ„ÉÄ„Éñ„É´„ÇØ„É™„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„Å¶„ÇΩ„Éï„Éà„Ç¶„Çß„Ç¢„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ ArchÁ≥ª„Éá„Ç£„Çπ„Éà„É™„Éì„É•„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥: AUR„Åã„ÇâChatALL„Çí„ÇØ„É≠„Éº„É≥„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô [„Åì„Å°„Çâ](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin)„ÄÇÊâãÂãï„Åß„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åô„Çã„Åã„ÄÅyay„ÇÑparu„ÅÆ„Çà„ÅÜ„Å™AUR„Éò„É´„Éë„Éº„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ„ÅÆ„Éá„Ç£„Çπ„Éà„É™„Éì„É•„Éº„Ç∑„Éß„É≥: .AppImage„Éï„Ç°„Ç§„É´„Çí„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„É≠„Éº„Éâ„Åó„ÄÅÂÆüË°åÂèØËÉΩ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„ÇØ„É™„ÉÉ„ÇØ„ÅßÂÆüË°å„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ[AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher)„ÇÇ‰ΩøÁî®„Åß„Åç„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ ## „Éà„É©„Éñ„É´„Ç∑„É•„Éº„ÉÜ„Ç£„É≥„Ç∞ ChatALL„Çí„ÅîÂà©Áî®‰∏≠„Å´ÂïèÈ°å„ÅåÁô∫Áîü„Åó„ÅüÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆËß£Ê±∫Á≠ñ„Çí„ÅäË©¶„Åó„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇÔºö 1. **ÂÜçË™≠„ÅøËæº„Åø** - Ctrl + R „Åæ„Åü„ÅØ ‚åò + R „ÇíÊäº„Åô„ÄÇ 2. **„Ç¢„Éó„É™„ÇíÂÜçËµ∑Âãï** - ChatALL„ÇíÁµÇ‰∫Ü„Åó„ÄÅÂÜçÂ∫¶ÂÆüË°å„Åô„Çã„ÄÇ 3. **ÂÜç„É≠„Ç∞„Ç§„É≥** - Âè≥‰∏ä„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„Éú„Çø„É≥„Çí„ÇØ„É™„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅÂêÑAI„ÅÆ `„É≠„Ç∞„Ç§„É≥/„É≠„Ç∞„Ç¢„Ç¶„Éà`„Çí„ÇØ„É™„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅ„Çµ„Ç§„Éà„Å´ÂÜç„É≠„Ç∞„Ç§„É≥„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ 4. **Êñ∞„Åó„ÅÑ„ÉÅ„É£„ÉÉ„Éà„Çí‰ΩúÊàê** - `New Chat` „Éú„Çø„É≥„Çí„ÇØ„É™„ÉÉ„ÇØ„Åó„ÄÅÂÜçÂ∫¶„Éó„É≠„É≥„Éó„Éà„ÇíÈÄÅ‰ø°„Åó„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ ‰∏äË®ò„ÅÆÊñπÊ≥ï„Åß„ÇÇ„ÅÜ„Åæ„Åè„ÅÑ„Åã„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ**ChatALL„ÇíÂàùÊúüÂåñ**„Åó„Å¶„Åø„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ„Åì„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„ÄÅÂÖ®„Å¶„ÅÆË®≠ÂÆö„Å®„É°„ÉÉ„Çª„Éº„Ç∏Â±•Ê≠¥„ÅåÂâäÈô§„Åï„Çå„Åæ„Åô„ÅÆ„Åß„ÅîÊ≥®ÊÑè„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ ChatALL„ÇíÂàùÊúüÂåñ„Åô„Çã„Å´„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰ª•‰∏ã„ÅÆ„Éá„Ç£„É¨„ÇØ„Éà„É™„ÇíÂâäÈô§„Åó„Åæ„ÅôÔºö - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` ÂïèÈ°å„ÅåËß£Ê±∫„Åó„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅ[Â†±Âëä„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues) ## „Éá„Éô„É≠„ÉÉ„Éë„ÉºÂêë„Åë ### AI„ÅÆÊèê‰æõ [„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA)„ÇíÂèÇËÄÉ„Å´„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ ### ÂÆüË°å ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### „Éì„É´„Éâ ÁèæÂú®„ÅÆ„Éó„É©„ÉÉ„Éà„Éï„Ç©„Éº„É†„Å´Âêà„Çè„Åõ„Å¶„Éì„É´„Éâ: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` „ÅÇ„Çâ„ÇÜ„Çã„Éó„É©„ÉÉ„Éà„Éï„Ç©„Éº„É†„Å´ÂØæÂøú„Åó„Åü„Éì„É´„Éâ: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## „ÇØ„É¨„Ç∏„ÉÉ„Éà ### Ë≤¢ÁåÆËÄÖ ### „Åù„ÅÆ‰ªñ - GPT-4„ÅØ„Ç≥„Éº„Éâ„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åó„Åü - ChatGPT„ÄÅCopilot„ÄÅGoogle„ÅØÂ§ö„Åè„ÅÆËß£Ê±∫Á≠ñ„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºà„É©„É≥„Ç≠„É≥„Ç∞È†ÜÔºâ - [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub)„ÅÆ„É™„Çπ„Éö„ÇØ„Éà„Åß„ÅôÔºÅ ## ÊîØÊè¥ËÄÖ „Åì„ÅÆ„Éó„É≠„Ç∏„Çß„ÇØ„Éà„ÅåÊ∞ó„Å´ÂÖ•„Å£„Åü„Çâ„ÄÅÊîØÊè¥„Å´„ÅîÊ§úË®é„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑÔºö [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

[Ïù¥ Î¨∏Ï†úÎì§](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/labels/more%20LLMs)ÏóêÏÑú Ï¢ãÏïÑÌïòÎäî Î¥áÏùÑ Ï∂îÏ≤úÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ### Ïõπ Í∏∞Î∞ò AI Î¥áÏùò Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ± Í¥ÄÎ†® ÏïàÎÇ¥ Ïõπ Í∏∞Î∞òÏúºÎ°ú Ïó∞Í≤∞ÎêòÎäî AI Î¥áÎì§("Ïõπ Ïï°ÏÑ∏Ïä§" ÏßÄÏõêÏúºÎ°ú ÌëúÏãúÎêú Î¥áÎì§)ÏùÄ Î≥∏ÏßàÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ±Ïù¥ Î∂ÄÏ°±ÌïòÎ©∞ ÏïàÏ†ïÏÑ± Î¨∏Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÏûêÏ£º Î∞úÏÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Ï†úÍ≥µÏóÖÏ≤¥Í∞Ä Ïõπ Ïù∏ÌÑ∞ÌéòÏù¥Ïä§ÏôÄ Î≥¥Ïïà Ï°∞ÏπòÎ•º ÏàòÏãúÎ°ú ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ÌïòÎ©∞, Ïù¥Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Î¶¨Î≤ÑÏä§ ÏóîÏßÄÎãàÏñ¥ÎßÅÏùÑ ÌÜµÌïú Ïú†ÏßÄÎ≥¥ÏàòÍ∞Ä ÌïÑÏöîÌïòÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Ïõπ Í∏∞Î∞ò Ïó∞Í≤∞ÏùÄ Ïú†ÏßÄÎ≥¥ÏàòÍ∞Ä Ïñ¥Î†µÍ≥† ÏòàÍ∏∞Ïπò ÏïäÍ≤å ÏûëÎèôÏù¥ Ï§ëÎã®Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î≥¥Îã§ ÏïàÏ†ïÏ†ÅÏù¥Í≥† Ïã†Î¢∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ Ïù¥Ïö©ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Ìïú API Ïï°ÏÑ∏Ïä§Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî Î¥áÏùò ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏùÑ Ï†ÅÍ∑π Í∂åÏû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ### Í∏∞ÌÉÄ Í∏∞Îä• - Îπ†Î•∏ ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ Î™®Îìú: Ïù¥Ï†Ñ ÏöîÏ≤≠Ïù¥ ÏôÑÎ£åÎê† ÎïåÍπåÏßÄ Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨ÏßÄ ÏïäÍ≥† Îã§Ïùå ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ Î≥¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞ - Ï±ÑÌåÖ Í∏∞Î°ùÏùÑ Î°úÏª¨Î°ú Ï†ÄÏû•ÌïòÍ≥† Í∞úÏù∏ Ï†ïÎ≥¥ Î≥¥Ìò∏ - ÏõêÌïòÎäî ÏùëÎãµÏùÑ Í∞ïÏ°∞ ÌëúÏãúÌïòÍ≥†, ÎÇòÏÅú ÏùëÎãµÏùÑ ÏÇ≠Ï†ú - Ïñ∏Ï†úÎì†ÏßÄ Î™®Îì† Î¥á ÏÇ¨Ïö©/ÏÇ¨Ïö© Ïïà Ìï® - 1Ïó¥, 2Ïó¥ ÎòêÎäî 3Ïó¥ Î≥¥Í∏∞ Í∞Ñ Ï†ÑÌôò - ÏµúÏã† Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÏúºÎ°ú ÏûêÎèô ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ - Ïñ¥ÎëêÏö¥ Î™®Îìú (@tanchekwei Í∏∞Ïó¨) - Îã®Ï∂ïÌÇ§. Ctrl + /Î•º ÎàÑÎ•¥Î©¥ Î™®Îì† Îã®Ï∂ïÌÇ§Î•º ÌôïÏù∏Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§ (@tanchekwei Í∏∞Ïó¨). - Îã§Ï§ë Ï±ÑÌåÖ (@tancheckwei Í∏∞Ïó¨) - ÌîÑÎ°ùÏãú ÏÑ§Ï†ï ÏßÄÏõê (@msaongÏóêÏÑú Ï†úÍ≥µ) - Ïã†ÏÜçÌïú Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ (contributed by @tanchekwei) - Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïñ∏Ïñ¥ ( ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥, Ï§ëÍµ≠Ïñ¥, ÏòÅÏñ¥, ÎèÖÏùºÏñ¥, ÌîÑÎûëÏä§Ïñ¥, Îü¨ÏãúÏïÑÏñ¥, Î≤†Ìä∏ÎÇ®Ïñ¥, ÏùºÎ≥∏Ïñ¥, Ïä§ÌéòÏù∏Ïñ¥, Ïù¥ÌÉàÎ¶¨ÏïÑÏñ¥) ÏßÄÏõê - Windows, macOS Î∞è Linux ÏßÄÏõê Í≥ÑÌöçÎêú Í∏∞Îä•: Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Í∏∞Îä•Ïóê Ï∞∏Ïó¨ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÌôòÏòÅÌï©ÎãàÎã§. - [ ] GitHub ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóê ÌîÑÎü∞Ìä∏ÏóîÎìú Î∞∞Ìè¨ ## Í∞úÏù∏ Ï†ïÎ≥¥ Î≥¥Ìò∏ Î™®Îì† Ï±ÑÌåÖ Í∏∞Î°ù, ÏÑ§Ï†ï Î∞è Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Í∞Ä Ïª¥Ìì®ÌÑ∞Ïóê Î°úÏª¨Î°ú Ï†ÄÏû•Îê©ÎãàÎã§. ChatALLÏùÄ Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏÑ†Ïóê ÎèÑÏõÄÏù¥ ÎêòÎäî ÏùµÎ™ÖÏùò ÏÇ¨Ïö© Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º ÏàòÏßëÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Îã§ÏùåÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®Ìï©ÎãàÎã§: - ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏Í∞Ä ÌëúÏãúÎêòÎäî AI Î¥áÍ≥º ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏Í∞Ä ÌëúÏãúÎêòÎäî ÏãúÍ∞Ñ. ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏ ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. - ÏùëÎãµ Í∏∞Í∞Ñ Î∞è ÏÇ≠Ï†ú/Í∞ïÏ°∞ ÌëúÏãúÎêú ÏùëÎãµ ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. ## Ï†ÑÏ†úÏ°∞Í±¥ ChatALLÏùÄ ÌîÑÎ°ùÏãúÍ∞Ä ÏïÑÎãå ÌÅ¥ÎùºÏù¥Ïñ∏Ìä∏Ïù¥ÎØÄÎ°ú Îã§Ïùå ÏûëÏóÖÏùÑ ÏàòÌñâÌï¥Ïïº Ìï©ÎãàÎã§: 1. Î¥áÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú ÏûëÏóÖ Í≥ÑÏ†ï Î∞è/ÎòêÎäî API ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïú†Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. 2. Î¥áÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïã†Î¢∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî ÎÑ§Ìä∏ÏõåÌÅ¨ Ïó∞Í≤∞ÏùÑ Í∞ñÏäµÎãàÎã§. ## Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìú / ÏÑ§Ïπò https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releasesÏóêÏÑú Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìú ### WindowsÏóêÏÑú \*-win.exe ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìúÌïòÍ≥† ÏÑ§ÏπòÎ•º Í≥ÑÏÜçÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ### macOSÏóêÏÑú Apple Silicon Mac (M1, M2 CPU)Ïùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ \*-mac-arm64.dmg ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìúÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Îã§Î•∏ MacÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ \*-mac-x64.dmg ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìúÌï©ÎãàÎã§. [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), )Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞ Îã§ÏùåÍ≥º Ìï®Íªò ÏÑ§ÏπòÌï† ÏàòÎèÑ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### LinuxÏóêÏÑú Debian Í∏∞Î∞ò Î∞∞Ìè¨: .deb ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìúÌïú ÌõÑ Îëê Î≤à ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏÜåÌîÑÌä∏Ïõ®Ïñ¥Î•º ÏÑ§ÏπòÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏïÑÏπò Í∏∞Î∞ò Î∞∞Ìè¨Ìåê: AUR [Ïó¨Í∏∞](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin)ÏóêÏÑú ChatALLÏùÑ Î≥µÏ†úÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏàòÎèôÏúºÎ°ú ÏÑ§ÏπòÌïòÍ±∞ÎÇò yay ÎòêÎäî paruÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ AUR ÎèÑÏö∞ÎØ∏Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ ÏÑ§ÏπòÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∏∞ÌÉÄ Î∞∞Ìè¨: .AppImage ÌååÏùºÏùÑ Îã§Ïö¥Î°úÎìúÌïòÏó¨ Ïã§Ìñâ Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÍ≤å ÎßåÎì§Í≥† ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï¥ÏÑú Ïã§Ìñâ Í≤ΩÌóòÏùÑ Ï¶êÍ∏∞Ïã§ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. [AppImageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher) Î•º Ïù¥Ïö©ÌïòÏã§ ÏàòÎèÑ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ## Î¨∏Ï†ú Ìï¥Í≤∞ ChatALLÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî ÎèôÏïà Î¨∏Ï†úÍ∞Ä Î∞úÏÉùÌïòÎ©¥ Îã§Ïùå Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Ìï¥Í≤∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§: 1. **ÏÉàÎ°ú Í≥†Ïπ®** - Ctrl + R ÎòêÎäî ‚åò + R ÏùÑ ÎàÑÎ¶ÖÎãàÎã§. 2. **Îã§Ïãú ÏãúÏûë** - ChatALLÏùÑ Ï¢ÖÎ£åÌïòÍ≥† Îã§Ïãú Ïã§ÌñâÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 3. **Îã§Ïãú Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏** - Ïò§Î•∏Ï™Ω ÏÉÅÎã® Î™®ÏÑúÎ¶¨Ïùò ÏÑ§Ï†ï Î≤ÑÌäºÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìïú Îã§Ïùå ÌåùÏóÖ Ï∞ΩÏóêÏÑú Ìï¥Îãπ Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏/Î°úÍ∑∏ÏïÑÏõÉ ÎßÅÌÅ¨Î•º ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ Ïõπ ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ìä∏Ïóê Îã§Ïãú Î°úÍ∑∏Ïù∏Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. 4. **ÏÉà Ï±ÑÌåÖ ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞** - `ÏÉà Ï±ÑÌåÖ` Î≤ÑÌäºÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìïú ÌõÑ ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏Î•º Îã§Ïãú Î≥¥ÎÉÖÎãàÎã§. ÏúÑÏùò Î∞©Î≤ï Ï§ë Ïñ¥Îäê Í≤ÉÎèÑ Ìö®Í≥ºÍ∞Ä ÏóÜÎã§Î©¥, **ChatALL Ï¥àÍ∏∞Ìôî**Î•º ÏãúÎèÑÌï¥ Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî. Ïù¥Î†áÍ≤å ÌïòÎ©¥ Î™®Îì† ÏÑ§Ï†ïÍ≥º Î©îÏãúÏßÄ ÎÇ¥Ïó≠Ïù¥ ÏÇ≠Ï†úÎêúÎã§Îäî Ï†êÏóê Ïú†ÏùòÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. Îã§Ïùå ÎîîÎ†âÌÑ∞Î¶¨Î•º ÏÇ≠Ï†úÌïòÏó¨ ChatALLÏùÑ Ïû¨ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` Î¨∏Ï†úÍ∞Ä ÏßÄÏÜçÎêòÎ©¥ [Î¨∏Ï†ú Ï†úÏ∂ú](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues)Î°ú Î¨∏ÏùòÌï¥ Ï£ºÏÑ∏Ïöî. ## Í∞úÎ∞úÏûêÏö© ### Î¥á Í∏∞Î∂Ä [Í∞ÄÏù¥Îìú](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/wiki/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E7%9A%84-AI-%E5%AF%B9%E8%AF%9D%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E4%BA%BA)Í∞Ä ÎèÑÏõÄÏù¥ Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ### Ïã§Ìñâ ```bash npm install npm run electron:serve ``` ### ÎπåÎìú ÌòÑÏû¨ ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏóê ÎßûÍ≤å ÎπåÎìú: ```bash npm run electron:build ``` Î™®Îì† ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú ÎπåÎìú: ```bash npm run electron:build -- -wml --x64 --arm64 ``` ## ÌÅ¨Î†àÎîß ### Í∏∞Ïó¨Ïûê ### Í∏∞ÌÉÄ - GPT-4Îäî ÏΩîÎìúÏùò ÎßéÏùÄ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÑ Í∏∞Ïó¨ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§ - ChatGPT, Copilot Î∞è GoogleÏùÄ ÎßéÏùÄ ÏÜîÎ£®ÏÖòÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§ (ÏàúÏÑúÎåÄÎ°ú ÎÇòÏó¥) - [ChatHub](https://github.com/chathub-dev/chathub)ÏóêÏÑú ÏòÅÍ∞êÏùÑ Î∞õÏïòÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï°¥Í≤ΩÌï©ÎãàÎã§! ## ÌõÑÏõê Ïù¥ ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏Í∞Ä ÎßàÏùåÏóê ÎìúÏã†Îã§Î©¥ Îã§ÏùåÏùÑ Í≥†Î†§Ìï¥ Ï£ºÏã≠ÏãúÏò§: [![ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/img/githubbutton_sm.svg)](https://ko-fi.com/F1F8KZJGJ)

ChatALL —Å–æ–±–∏—Ä–∞–µ—Ç –∞–Ω–æ–Ω–∏–º–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ–± –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–º–æ—á—å –Ω–∞–º —É–ª—É—á—à–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç. –í–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è: - –ö–∞–∫–∏–µ –±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏—Å–∫—É—Å—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–ª–ª–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞—é—Ç –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –∏ –∫–∞–∫–æ–≤–∞ –¥–ª–∏–Ω–∞ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞. –ù–µ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∞. - –ù–∞—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –¥–ª–∏–Ω–Ω—ã–º —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç, –∏ –∫–∞–∫–æ–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω/–≤—ã–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω. –ù–µ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—è —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç–∞. ## –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è ChatALL - —ç—Ç–æ –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç, –∞ –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–æ–∫—Å–∏. –°–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ, –≤—ã –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω—ã: 1. –ò–º–µ—Ç—å —Ä–∞–±–æ—á–∏–µ —É—á–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –∑–∞–ø–∏—Å–∏ –∏/–∏–ª–∏ —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω—ã API –¥–ª—è –±–æ—Ç–æ–≤. 2. –û–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á—å—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–¥–µ–∂–Ω–æ–µ —Å–µ—Ç–µ–≤–æ–µ –ø–æ–¥–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫ –±–æ—Ç–∞–º. ## –°–∫–∞—á–∞—Ç—å / —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –°–∫–∞—á–∞—Ç—å —Å https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/releases ### –í Windows –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Å–∫–∞—á–∞–π—Ç–µ \*-win.exe —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª –∏ –ø—Ä–∏—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–π—Ç–µ –∫ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–µ. ### –ù–∞ macOS –î–ª—è Apple Silicon Mac (–ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä M1, M2) –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∏—Ç–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª \*-mac-arm64.dmg. –î–ª—è –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä–æ–≤ Mac –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∏—Ç–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª \*-mac-x64.dmg. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç–µ [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/), –≤—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é: ```bash brew install --cask chatall ``` ### –ù–∞ Linux –î–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤—ã –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Debian: –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∏—Ç–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª .deb, –¥–≤–∞–∂–¥—ã —â–µ–ª–∫–Ω–∏—Ç–µ –µ–≥–æ –∏ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≥—Ä–∞–º–º–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ. –î–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤—ã –Ω–∞ –±–∞–∑–µ Arch: –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –∫–ª–æ–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å ChatALL –∏–∑ AUR [–∑–¥–µ—Å—å](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/chatall-bin). –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ —É—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å –µ–≥–æ –≤—Ä—É—á–Ω—É—é –∏–ª–∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –ø–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫–∞ AUR, —Ç–∞–∫–æ–≥–æ –∫–∞–∫ yay –∏–ª–∏ paru. –î—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ –¥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∏–±—É—Ç–∏–≤—ã: –°–∫–∞—á–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ñ–∞–π–ª .AppImage, —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–π—Ç–µ –µ–≥–æ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª–Ω—è–µ–º—ã–º –∏ –Ω–∞—Å–ª–∞–∂–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ—Å—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–º –∑–∞–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –ø–æ —â–µ–ª—á–∫—É –º—ã—à–∏. –í—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å [AppimageLauncher](https://github.com/TheAssassin/AppImageLauncher). ## –†–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤—ã —Å—Ç–æ–ª–∫–Ω–µ—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å –∫–∞–∫–∏–º–∏-–ª–∏–±–æ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞–º–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏ ChatALL, –≤—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥—ã –∏—Ö —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è: 1. **–û–±–Ω–æ–≤–∏—Ç—å** - –Ω–∞–∂–º–∏—Ç–µ Ctrl + R –∏–ª–∏ ‚åò + R. 2. **–ü–µ—Ä–µ–∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç—å** - –≤—ã–π–¥–∏—Ç–µ –∏–∑ ChatALL –∏ –∑–∞–ø—É—Å—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –µ–≥–æ —Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞. 3. **–ü–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –≤—Ö–æ–¥ –≤ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É** - –Ω–∞–∂–º–∏—Ç–µ –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫—É –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –≤ –ø—Ä–∞–≤–æ–º –≤–µ—Ä—Ö–Ω–µ–º —É–≥–ª—É, –∑–∞—Ç–µ–º –ø–µ—Ä–µ–π–¥–∏—Ç–µ –ø–æ —Å–æ–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–µ–π —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ –≤—Ö–æ–¥–∞/–≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–∞ –∏–∑ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –ø–æ–≤—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω–æ –≤–æ–π—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤–µ–±—Å–∞–π—Ç. 4. **–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–π—Ç–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π —á–∞—Ç** - –Ω–∞–∂–º–∏—Ç–µ –∫–Ω–æ–ø–∫—É "–°–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å —á–∞—Ç" –∏ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤—å—Ç–µ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å –µ—â–µ —Ä–∞–∑. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–∏ –æ–¥–∏–Ω –∏–∑ –≤—ã—à–µ–ø–µ—Ä–µ—á–∏—Å–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–≤ –Ω–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç, –≤—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –ø–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å **—Å–±—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ ChatALL**. –û–±—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ, —á—Ç–æ –ø—Ä–∏ —ç—Ç–æ–º –±—É–¥—É—Ç —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω—ã –≤—Å–µ –≤–∞—à–∏ –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ –∏ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è —Å–æ–æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–π. –í—ã –º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ —Å–±—Ä–æ—Å–∏—Ç—å –Ω–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏ ChatALL, —É–¥–∞–ª–∏–≤ —Å–ª–µ–¥—É—é—â–∏–µ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥–∏: - Windows: `C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\chatall\` - Linux: `/home//.config/chatall/` - macOS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/chatall/` –ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–±–ª–µ–º–∞ –Ω–µ —É—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∞, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, [–æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤—å—Ç–µ issue](https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL/issues). ## files.name: babel.config.js

package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "chatall",
  "version": "1.83.108",
  "description": "Chat with multiple AI bots and discover the best.",
  "author": {
    "name": "Sun Zhigang",
    "email": "sunner@gmail.com",
    "url": "http://sunner.cn"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/ai-shifu/ChatALL.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "serve": "vue-cli-service serve",
    "build": "vue-cli-service build",
    "lint": "vue-cli-service lint",
    "format": "prettier --write --cache src/",
    "electron:build": "vue-cli-service electron:build",
    "electron:serve": "vue-cli-service electron:serve",
    "postinstall": "electron-builder install-app-deps",
    "postuninstall": "electron-builder install-app-deps",
    "start": "electron .",
    "release-all": "vue-cli-service electron:build -wml --x64 --arm64",
    "release-macos": "vue-cli-service electron:build --mac --x64 --arm64",
    "release-linux": "vue-cli-service electron:build --linux --x64 --arm64",
    "release-windows": "vue-cli-service electron:build --win --x64 --arm64",
    "prepare": "husky install"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@kangc/v-md-editor": "^2.3.18",
    "@langchain/anthropic": "^0.3.11",
    "@langchain/cohere": "^0.0.11",
    "@langchain/community": "^0.3.20",
    "@langchain/google-genai": "^0.1.6",
    "@langchain/groq": "^0.1.2",
    "@langchain/openai": "^0.3.16",
    "@langchain/xai": "^0.0.1",
    "@mdi/font": "^7.4.47",
    "@vueuse/rxjs": "^12.2.0",
    "async-lock": "^1.4.1",
    "axios": "^1.7.9",
    "babel-plugin-prismjs": "^2.1.0",
    "compare-versions": "^6.1.1",
    "core-js": "^3.39.0",
    "dexie": "^4.0.10",
    "dexie-export-import": "^4.1.4",
    "electron-builder": "^25.1.8",
    "jszip": "^3.10.1",
    "katex": "^0.16.19",
    "langchain": "^0.3.8",
    "localforage": "^1.10.0",
    "material-design-icons": "^3.0.1",
    "prismjs": "^1.29.0",
    "query-string": "^9.1.1",
    "rxjs": "^7.8.1",
    "sortablejs": "^1.15.6",
    "update-electron-app": "^3.1.0",
    "uuid": "^11.0.3",
    "vue": "^3.5.13",
    "vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder": "^3.0.0-alpha.4",
    "vue-i18n": "^9.14.2",
    "vue-matomo": "^4.2.0",
    "vue3-shortkey": "^4.0.0",
    "vuetify": "^3.7.6",
    "vuex": "^4.1.0",
    "vuex-persist": "^3.1.3",
    "websocket-as-promised": "^3.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.26.0",
    "@babel/eslint-parser": "^7.25.9",
    "@electron/osx-sign": "^1.3.2",
    "@vue/cli": "^5.0.8",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-babel": "~5.0.8",
    "@vue/cli-plugin-eslint": "~5.0.8",
    "@vue/cli-service": "~5.0.8",
    "electron": "^33.2.1",
    "electron-devtools-installer": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint": "^8.57.1",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-vue": "^9.32.0",
    "husky": "^8.0.3",
    "lint-staged": "^15.3.0",
    "md5": "^2.3.0",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "prettier-plugin-vue": "^1.1.6",
    "sse.js": "^2.5.0"
  },
  "eslintConfig": {
    "root": true,
    "env": {
      "node": true
    },
    "extends": [
      "plugin:vue/vue3-essential",
      "eslint:recommended",
      "plugin:prettier/recommended"
    ],
    "plugins": [
      "prettier"
    ],
    "parserOptions": {
      "parser": "@babel/eslint-parser"
    },
    "rules": {}
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{js,ts,vue,jsx.tsx}": "npm run lint"
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "> 1%",
    "last 2 versions",
    "not dead",
    "not ie 11"
  ],
  "license": "Apache-2.0",
  "overrides": {
    "@langchain/core": "~0.3.26",
    "vue-cli-plugin-electron-builder": {
      "electron-builder": "^25.1.8"
    }
  }
}
